Core:Properties.Core:Property: "\{? \| \$(this.trait:bead:material) \| These particular posts have been decoratively shaped to fit as a setting around intricately detailed-artfully cut-dainty, detailed, artfully crafted, painstakingly carved \$(this.trait:bead:material) \$(this.trait:bead:type)s.\}\{? \| \$(this.details:gempieces:snames) \| The area surrounding the central setting of the \$(this.trait:brief) has been sporadically decorated with tiny inset \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material)s.
